name: Slime Defense (Jam Version)
description:
Most Simple TD in existence, probably? A tiny tutorial on how the game works:

- Press Space when the Skull Icon is grey to start  a wave.

- Press R to generate a new Map.

- You can build Turrets on the spots with a "+" on them, costs 50 each.

- You can buy upgrades by pressing  on a Turret and then pressing the arrow above it.

Fun fact: full of bugs, also sometimes when you move the cursor away from the tower it can happen that the upgrade icon stays on screen, why does this happen? Because of my shitty coding skills :D (Only way to get rid of it is by reloading the map (Starting a new game or pressing R))
